Borghal

We’re gone!
This is the final pic we took in front of our house. With the place empty and cleaned, we set out on to our next adventure. We're too tired to start driving today, though, so we're spending the night at a local hotel.

content.value:
We’re gone!
This is the final pic we took in front of our house. With the place empty and cleaned, we set out on to our next adventure. We're too tired to start driving today, though, so we're spending the night at a local hotel.
